intro: Oreogrammitis nigropaleata, commonly known as the black-stemmed wall moss, is a species of moss belonging to the family Pottiaceae. It is characterized by its dark green to blackish stems and leaves that are often reddish when dry. This moss typically grows on rock surfaces, especially in shaded, moist environments. It has a compact growth form and is often found in temperate regions. Oreogrammitis nigropaleata is noted for its resilience to desiccation, making it well adapted to harsh, rocky habitats.
